template.name: Viper Activity
template.description: It creates a Viper-managed Activity bound to empty implementation of ViperActivityPresenter with appropriate Contract and relatives - Interactor and Routing.

parameter.name: Activity name
parameter.help: The name of the Viper-managed Activity class to create

parameter.name: Create ViewHelper for advanced Android transitions?
parameter.help: Create ViewHelper that allows Routing accessing Activity android.Views to allow Routing perform advanced transitions.

parameter.name: Launcher Activity
parameter.help: If true, this activity will have a CATEGORY_LAUNCHER intent filter, making it visible in the launcher

parameter.name: Enable ViewState handling
parameter.help: Add ViewState handling by inheriting from Mosby-based ViewStateActivty

parameter.name: Enable packaging per use case?
parameter.help: If true, classes will be created in single package, if false, classes will be created in packages per VIPER elements
